typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		COD_DPTO as string,
		COD_DANE as string,
		DEPARTAMENTO as string,
		MUNICIPIO as string,
		ORIP as string,
		VEREDA as string,
		MATRICULA as string,
		TIPO_PREDIO as string,
		NRO_ANOTACION as string,
		COD_NATURALEZA as string,
		NATURALEZA_JURIDICA as string,
		VALOR as string,
		DIRECCION as string,
		Divipola_Mun_0001 as string,
		ZRE_NOMBRE as string,
		SISTEMA as string,
		NRO_PROPIETARIOS as string,
		ESTADO_FOLIO as string,
		{Aï¿½O RADICACION} as string,
		LINDERO as string,
		SMMLV as string,
		RANGOS_AVALUOS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		COD_DPTO,
		COD_DANE,
		DEPARTAMENTO,
		MUNICIPIO,
		ORIP,
		VEREDA,
		MATRICULA,
		TIPO_PREDIO,
		NRO_ANOTACION,
		COD_NATURALEZA,
		NATURALEZA_JURIDICA,
		VALOR,
		DIRECCION,
		Divipola_Mun_0001,
		ZRE_NOMBRE,
		SISTEMA,
		NRO_PROPIETARIOS,
		ESTADO_FOLIO,
		ANIO_RADICACION = {Aï¿½O RADICACION},
		LINDERO,
		SMMLV,
		RANGOS_AVALUOS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(TIPO_PREDIO != 'URBANO') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
